events.title: Breaking Sound September 25 2024 at The Peppermint Club
events.location: Los Angeles, California, United States Of America
events.description: Ages: 21+ GET TO KNOW THE ARTISTS: With Drive!Drive! bringing heavy pop hooks, funky guitar riffs and retro synths that get people dancing at every show, Lauren Evans making memorable music across multiple genres, Sergio Snow building a name for himself in the music industry, and Michelle Majors ready to take the world by storm - this is a lineup surely not to be missed.
